participant_id.Description: ID number assigned to participant (prefix sub-).

study_id.Description: Anonymized participant identifier in larger DBS study.

behavior.Description: Whether affective MSIT behavioral data is available for the participant.

mri.Description: Whether an anatomical MRI scan is available for the participant.

eeg.Description: Whether task EEG data is available for the participant.

rest.Description: Whether resting state EEG data is available for the participant.

ybocs_bl.Description: Summary score on the Yale-Brown Obessive Compulsive Scale (Y-BOCS) immediately prior to surgery.

ybocs_fu.Description: Summary score on the Yale-Brown Obessive Compulsive Scale (Y-BOCS) at follow-up visit (i.e. time of EEG data collection).

madrs_bl.Description: Summary score on the Montgomery-Asberg Depression Rating Scale (MADRS) immediately prior to surgery.

madrs_fu.Description: Summary score on the Montgomery-Asberg Depression Rating Scale (MADRS) at follow-up visit (i.e. time of EEG data collection).

responder.Description: Whether the participant achieved clinical response at any point during his/her clinical trial; the criterion was a 50% drop in MADRS or a 35% drop in YBOCS. This may not have corresponded to the score at the time of study data collection.

hypomania.Description: Whether the participant ever experienced a hypomanic episode following DBS surgery.

dbs_stim_freq.Description: Frequency of participant's chronic deep brain stimulation.
